member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:TimeClockIn.Controllers.ClockInController
member.summary:
The ClockIn Endpoint allows for inserting new ClockIn events and als access into the registered ClockIn Events
Results can be filtered based on the parameters supplied.

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.ClockInController.GetClockIn(System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint returns the ClockIn event with the specified by "id"
member.param: This is a Key value used to carry out a database search with a specefic ID

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.ClockInController.GetClockIn(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary:
This is a function that helps to perform dynamic search on the on the ClockIn table using various parameters.
When ALL parameters are specified, the result generated is filtered based on the specified values.
When NO parameter is specified, It returns ALL clockin events.
When ONE of two dates are specified, the results returned are filtered by ONLY the specified date.
When TWO DATES are specified, the ClockIn results returned are BETWEEN the two dates.
For a User's specific ClockIn History, this parameter only requires the EmployeeUserId parameter.
member.param:
This is an OPTIONAL parameter (representing employee email address).
When specified, it checks for all clockin events with the specified EmployeeUserId.
This is an OPTIONAL parameter (representing VGG office locations). When specified, it checks for all clockin events with the specified LocationName.
This is an OPTIONAL parameter which when specified ALONE returns ClockIn Events on this particular date. When used with ToDateTime, It must be less than.
This is an OPTIONAL parameter which when specified ALONE returns ClockIn Events on this particular date. when used with FromDateTime, It must be greater than
member.returns: This returns a list of clockin events based of the specified filters

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.ClockInController.PostClockIn(TimeClockIn.Models.ClockInWithDetails)
member.summary: This endpoint adds a ClockIn event. It requires a complex parameter representing the ClockIn parameters and Extra Details when required.
member.param:
This requires only EmployeeClockIn parameter.
when the clockin location is a registered location Optional parameter, EmployeeLocationDetails is supplied based on ClockIn Locations outside the registered office Locations i.e Home or Site

member.name: T:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationDetailsController
member.summary: This Endpoint Gets details of External Location for a ClockIn Event

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationDetailsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: When a user clocks in at an external location, extra location details are inserted. in order to recover the details, specify the EmployeeClockInId
member.param: This parameter represents the ClockIn event that has extra details in EmployeeLocationDetails. The endpoint retrieves the location details to an external clock in event

member.name: T:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationController
member.summary: The Location Endpoint allows for acess to the number of registered office locations in Nigeria

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationController.GetLocation
member.summary: This returns a list of all REGISTERED office Locations

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationController.GetLocation(System.Int32)
member.summary: This returns the Location with the specific ID
member.param: The ID parameter filters the search for a specific loaction

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationController.GetLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Search for location by the Location name
member.param: This parameter can represent the exact name of location or possible words to search for in all Locations
member.returns: This returns a list of Locations are similar or exactly alike to the parameter specified

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationController.PostLocation(TimeClockIn.Models.Location)
member.summary: Add a new location
member.param: This parameter represents the location object to be added. Expected to have ONLY LocationName, Latitude, Longitude, Address

member.name: M:TimeClockIn.Controllers.LocationController.UpdateLocation(System.Int32,TimeClockIn.Models.Location)
member.summary: This is an update function which can be used to make changes to an existing location record
member.param: This is the ID to the record being updated
This is the Location record with the updated attributes to be inserted

member.name: T:TimeClockIn.Models.ClockInWithDetails
member.summary:
This is a Complex Model used to Add a new ClockInEvent.
The EmployeeClockIn Object is required in order to add a new ClockIn Event.
The EmployeeLocationDetails is optional only when a ClockIn is made from registered Locations. It is needed when EmployeeClockIn.LocationName is either "HOME" or "SITE" or not any of the registered locations

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.ClockInWithDetails.EmployeeClockIn
member.summary:
Supply EmployeeUserId and LocationName here
Set EmployeeLocationDetails to null

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.ClockInWithDetails.EmployeeLocationDetails
member.summary:
Populate this object only when the ClockIn location is not a registered address
Supply LocationName (This is not the same as the one in EmployeeClockIn, it represents the name of the new location. e.g a client's office - "The View Hotel" ), Address and Location Coordinates (Latitude and Longitude)

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeClockIn.id
member.summary: Clock In ID

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeClockIn.EmployeeUserId
member.summary: User Id => Email Address

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeClockIn.LocationName
member.summary: Name of Office Location

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeClockIn.ClockInDateTime
member.summary: ClockIn Date and Time

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeLocationDetails.id
member.summary: Unique Identifier

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeLocationDetails.EmployeeClockInId
member.summary: This is a foreign link to the ClockIn event with the extra details

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeLocationDetails.LocationName
member.summary: The Location name is the name of the Venue. e.g ("FAAN")

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeLocationDetails.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude Coordinate of the Clockin Location

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeLocationDetails.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude Coordinate of the Clockin Location

member.name: P:TimeClockIn.Models.EmployeeLocationDetails.Address
member.summary: The physical address of the venue. e.g ("Plot 3, X Close, Y Street, Lagos")
